metadata.title: Exolgo Tendresse Waterproof Eyeliner | 2 In 1 Soft Silky Long Lasting Eye Liner With Sponge Applicator | Automatic Self Sharpening Eye Definer Pen With Pin Point Accuracy | Made In Germany | (Soft Brown)
features: ACHIEVE THAT PROFESSIONAL LOOK: This eyeliner pencil is designed for professionals and DIYers. It has a self-sharpening point and pin-point accuracy, so looking your best will never be easier.

SOFT, SILKY SMOOTH TEXTURE: The waterproof eye color pencil is waterproof and has a buttery soft, silky texture. It feels so nice on the skin. Please Note: the lead is NOT retractable, so you have to slowly turn the pencil a few times, to prime it.
MADE WITH A BUILT-IN SPONGE: Our premium eyeliner pencil comes with a sponge applicator for your convenience. This sponge will help soften and smudge out your application for an even softer effect.

BEAUTIFUL LONG-LASTING COLORS: Choose from 3 shades (Black, Dark Brown and Soft Brown). Each shade is designed to last up to 10 hours. Our special manufacturing techniques allow a higher concentration of pigment, so the colors are much richer.

COSMETICS PROUDLY MADE IN GERMANY: At Exolgo Tendresse, we make high quality, convenient beauty products for women. We're committed to helping all women look and feel their best. If you have any questions, please reach out so we can assist you.
